      protected void movePlayerForward()
      Move the third and the fourth player one space forward
      private void rearrangeClientHandlers​(java.util.ArrayList<ClientHandler> clients, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
      Rearrange the ClientHandlers array to match the Players one The ClientHandlers one is ordered as the Clients connected, the Players one as the order of the Game
      Game setupGame​(java.util.ArrayList<ClientHandler> clients)
      Setup a Game: - create the Players and the RemoteViews from the ClientHandlers - distribute 4 LeaderCards to each Player - choose randomly the first Player - move the third and fourth Player forward on their FaithTracks - add the RemoteViews as Observers - send the Model to the Clients using the ModelObservers
      void setupPersistenceGame​(java.util.ArrayList<ClientHandler> clients, Game game)
      Persistence Recreate a Game: - create the RemoteViews from the ClientHandlers - add the RemoteViews as ModelObservers - send the Model to the Clients using the ModelObservers
      void setupPersistenceSoloGame​(java.util.ArrayList<ClientHandler> clients, SoloGame game)
      Persistence Recreate a SoloGame: - create the RemoteView from the ClientHandler - add the RemoteView as ModelObserver - send the Model to the Client using the ModelObserver
      SoloGame setupSoloGame​(java.util.ArrayList<ClientHandler> clients)
      Setup a SoloGame: - create the Player and the RemoteView from the ClientHandler - distribute 4 LeaderCards to the Player - add the RemoteView as Observer - send the Model to the Client using the ModelObserver

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • setupGame

        public Game setupGame​(java.util.ArrayList<ClientHandler> clients)
               throws java.lang.InstantiationException
        Setup a Game: - create the Players and the RemoteViews from the ClientHandlers - distribute 4 LeaderCards to each Player - choose randomly the first Player - move the third and fourth Player forward on their FaithTracks - add the RemoteViews as Observers - send the Model to the Clients using the ModelObservers
        Parameters:
        clients - the ClientHandlers of the Players
        Returns:
        the new Game
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException

      • setupSoloGame

        public SoloGame setupSoloGame​(java.util.ArrayList<ClientHandler> clients)
                       throws java.lang.InstantiationException
        Setup a SoloGame: - create the Player and the RemoteView from the ClientHandler - distribute 4 LeaderCards to the Player - add the RemoteView as Observer - send the Model to the Client using the ModelObserver
        Parameters:
        clients - the ClientHandler of the Player
        Returns:
        the new SoloGame
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException

      • setupPersistenceGame

        public void setupPersistenceGame​(java.util.ArrayList<ClientHandler> clients,
                                 Game game)
                          throws java.lang.InstantiationException
        Persistence Recreate a Game: - create the RemoteViews from the ClientHandlers - add the RemoteViews as ModelObservers - send the Model to the Clients using the ModelObservers
        Parameters:
        clients - the ClientHandlers of the Players
        game - the Game parsed from the json file
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException

                                     java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
                              throws java.lang.InstantiationException
        Rearrange the ClientHandlers array to match the Players one The ClientHandlers one is ordered as the Clients connected, the Players one as the order of the Game
